translation.start.narration: Welcome to my first Alexa skill! It is a very pleasant day. Let's make this day productive as well.
translation.question.narration: Would you like to decide what you want to study after 10th standard?
translation.pick stream.narration: Great! Let's plan your future today. First, tell me, was your score higher than Ninety percent in 10th standard examinations?
translation.good score.narration:
Congratulations on scoring so well in you exams! Now, let us decide what you want to study next.  
Are you interested in science, arts or Commerce?
translation.good score science.narration: Good job picking Science. Your parents and society will approve of you picking science. Now tell me, do you want to be a doctor or an engineer?
translation.engineer.narration: Brilliant Choice! You'll be a great engineer some day. Be it making cars, buildings or alexa skills. All the best for your JEE exams!
translation.doctor.narration: Excellent choice! You will save thousands of lives, it is a noble profession.
translation.good score commerce.narration:
That is a good choice! World is in need of smart people who can run a succesful buisness. 
I wish you well, Study hard!
translation.good score arts.narration: Congratulations on scoring good marks! Are you sure your parents will allow you to study Arts? the society may judge you.
translation.utterance-i want to but i am not sure: i want to but i am not sure
translation.arts sure.narration: Good! Never be afraid of society's judgement. I wish you well and may the force be with you.
translation.bad score.narration: Do not worry buddy, marks are just one of many aspects of life. Let us forget about the past and decide what the future will be.
translation.pick one.narration: Pick one among Science, commerce and Arts.
translation.bad score science.narration: Good choice. But are you sure you want to study science, getting science stream in schools with a low score may be difficult?
translation.utterance-no i do not want to: no i do not want to
translation.low score science study.narration: Good! Scores do not reflect a student's interest in a subject.
translation.low score science not study.narration: Study whatever you want, not what others want you to. Let's pick a stream again.
translation.bad score arts.narration: Great choice! There are so many writers, lawyers, I.A.S officers and poets who scored low in 10th but excel in their respective fields now.
translation.bad score commerce.narration: Good choice. Running a successful buisness has nothing to do with how much you scored in a test. All the best!
translation.do not pick stream.narration: Are you sure you don't want to pick a stream and decide what you want to study in the future?
